title: B1-66ER
author: B1-66ER
content: I came across a tweet while reading about a conference in Europe (https://www.btcprague.com/). Someone tweeted, 'Looks like Ledger's Operation Self-destruct has been an unequivocal success...' along with a link to the tweet:  https://twitter.com/MichaelRoerade/status/1667189558444695555There might be some video edits, but I believe this represents how Bitcoiners are feeling about Ledger right now.

comments.author: dkbit98
comments.body: Quote from: B1-66ER on June 09, 2023, 05:15:23 PMI came across a tweet while reading about a conference in Europe (https://www.btcprague.com/). Someone tweeted, 'Looks like Ledger's Operation Self-destruct has been an unequivocal success...' along with a link to the tweet:  This could be some very clever video editing done intentionally to damage ledger and I would like to see confirmation from several sources, but I wouldn't be surprised if something like this is actually happening.I am not the one who is defending ledger at all (my post history proves that) but I always like to double check what really happened.Anyway, this would be a good chance to buy hardware wallet with cash or with BTC directly from manufacturers, so if you are in Prague you know what to do, and not much time left...

comments.author: Yamane_Keto
comments.body: The angle of the video filming does not indicate whether there is an individual standing in the corner, but with the negligence that I see from many people in using their bank accounts or trusting a third party to manage their passwords, I expect an increasing demand from Average Joe to buy Ledger wallets.They won't get attention at conferences or technical forums, but for the public, the idea of having encryption data and able to access it from anywhere without fear is still attractive.

comments.author: Sarah Azhari
comments.body: Quote from: B1-66ER on June 09, 2023, 05:15:23 PMBTC PRAGUE CONFERENCE & EXPO 2023Besides that, Another one that make I was surprised and excited about this EXPO 2023 is someone bringing a portable mining machine to the expo. I don't know how it works, but it seems impossible to get some Satoshi with a limited battery supply.   , but so far is cool, maybe next in the metaverse world it could be happening in our dreams.

comments.author: Yamane_Keto
comments.body: Quote from: Sarah Azhari on June 11, 2023, 02:26:31 AM I don't know how it works, but it seems impossible to get some Satoshi with a limited battery supply.   , but so far is cool, maybe next in the metaverse world it could be happening in our dreams.It seems that this is a little off topic or it is better to discuss it in mining board, but I do not think that it is a battery because the S9 mining tool works on AC, so you need a battery and a converter. If we ignore the noise and the cooling mechanism, all these things make that mining bag movable NOT portable.As for the return, it will definitely not be a solo mining, but within mining pool. it will have a return more than some Satoshis.I remember seeing it before, it's nothing new in EXPO 2023.
